name: Liquid Liquid
description: '''Liquid Liquid''' is an American [[dance-punk]] group, originally active from 1980 to 1983. They are best known for their track "Cavern," which was covered—without proper permission or attribution—by the [[Sugar Hill Records (rap)|Sugar Hill Records]] house band as the backing track for Melle Mel's [[old school rap]] classic "[[White Lines (Don't Do It)|White Lines (Don't Don't Do It)]]." The group released a series of extended plays, including the acclaimed 1983 12" EP ''[[Optimo (EP)|Optimo]]''. In 2008, the band reformed and have played in multiple countries.
